title: Our Products
description: A wonderfully blended and balanced American-style light lager. Natural Light is a favorite drink when you're making those epic stories happen. Its longer brewing process produces a lighter body, fewer calories, and an easy-drinking character that's welcome in your story.
cleaned_text: Earn Points. Redeem for Amazing Prizes.It's easy! Upload receipts to earn 10 points per $1. Get more by taking quizzes and inviting friends. [earn now](https://app.mycooler.com/landing) Find Natty Near You Look good, play good Natural Light Vintage Logo T-Shirt [View Here](https://www.shopbeergear.com/products/natural-light-vintage-logo-tee) Our Products Natural Light All American Wheat Ale This American-style light lager is a refreshingly reliable partner in crime for any social outing. From a casual backyard hang to the boat, crab boils and beyond, our longer brewing process produces a lighter body with fewer calories for an easy-drinking Shore Champagne that's always best when shared. Naturdays Strawberry Lemonade A sessionable, light lager made with a phenomenal combination of ripe strawberry and fresh lemonade flavors that are perfect for increasing the fun of every occasion. For those who like strawberry lemonade...and drinking beer. Sit back and relax; it's Naturday!
